comment: Fantastic! This was his first-semester teaching and he was great. Very understanding, caring, and personable. You have an online quiz about once a week, he assigns a discussion post about every two weeks, 2 tests online and he assigns a group project case study. It was a decent amount of work however easy to do! If I could take him again I would!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring
